page.title: About
page.heading: Purpose-built retail storytelling
page.subheading: Mobi Store is a conceptual storefront that demonstrates how merchants can launch content-rich experiences across multiple tenants.

origin.title: Born from merchant feedback
origin.copy: We prototyped this tenant after interviewing 40+ Mobi merchants about the blockers they face when experimenting with new verticals. Templates and mock data let teams preview the end result before the API integration is ready.

mission.title: Design freely, integrate later
mission.copy: By separating content, data mocks, and templates, you can evolve storytelling faster than backend timelines. When the live MobiCMS endpoints are ready, simply swap the data provider without rebuilding the UI.

items.title: Sustainable defaults
items.description: Every component highlights how eco-minded retailers merchandise products and tell impact stories.

items.title: Composable design
items.description: Macros and partials keep layouts consistent while giving you freedom to rearrange sections per tenant.

items.title: Launch velocity
items.description: Mock data unlocks stakeholder reviews without waiting on integrations or production content.

events.title: Template research
events.copy: Interviewed multi-tenant retailers using MobiCMS and gathered common merchandising patterns.

events.title: Mock data toolkit
events.copy: Shipped the mock data provider so teams can iterate on product storytelling offline.

events.title: Storefront beta
events.copy: Released the store tenant templates you are viewing now, ready to wire into live product feeds.
